name: tuberia-markdown-module
description: Converts markdown in document content into HTML as part of a Tuberia pipeline.

scripts.build-test: ./node_modules/.bin/babel --plugins babel-plugin-rewire --optional es7.functionBind -d lib/ src/ && ./node_modules/.bin/babel --plugins babel-plugin-rewire --optional es7.functionBind -d spec/out/ spec/src/

author: Colin Bate <colin@colinbate.com>
